column3: str

Zukin is in a stink over an attack on a caravan.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the cranky Kojin on the Isle of Bekko.
Seek out Red Kojin and smear them with golden aspic upon their defeat.
Report to Zukin.
The Red, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─they have fallen upon one of our caravans!
By the grace of the kami, we were able to protect the goods, but the Red brigands remain at large. I need you to join us in hunting them down.

Once you have found and given them a trouncing, smear this all over them. Golden aspic, it is called, and it is made by─actually, 'tis best that you do not know. The point is it smells foul, and will serve to teach the offending Reds a lesson.
Even as we speak, one of our sisters is scouring the Isle of Bekko for them. Seek her out first, and she will tell you more.
The Red brigands struck fast, but they fled even faster. If you would search the northern shoreline, I will see to the rest of the isle.
And as Zukin will have told you, after you subdue the villains, you are to smear golden aspic all over them. Do not forget this step.
D-Damn! Come on, then!
K-Kami have mercy, the stench!
Hmph! And I was so close to the water!
Nooo! A-Anything but that!
Grrr, I'm not finished yet!
What the─ Uhhh... I'm going to be─ Hurrrgh!
Ah, you are returned. Were you able to find and punish the Red in the manner prescribed?
Haha, well done, my friend! Our comrades shall be pleased to learn that you have dealt with the brigands!
The poor sods will reek for a good while, and until such time as the odor fades, they are like to be spurned by their own. A fine lesson, yes?
